name: Ing. Michael Arias
bio: Lead projects manager in engineering, I plan Web design (UX-UI), 3D CAD engineering design, process control engineering, and material structures specification. Experience in: Continuous improvement, Product design, Content marketing strategy, digital transformation. As a leader, I care about the development of each member, and I have a good aptitude for self-training. I am willing to commit my discernment and imagination for bringing the best results.

education.description: Modern tools and techniques in project formulation and evaluation
Mechanical Engineer, recognized for the best grade in the Saber Pro test of the 2017-1 promotion.

experience.jobDescription: Specification of physical security and intelligent protection systems, readers, access panels, video surveillance, home automation, electronic locks and doors. We carry out preventive and corrective maintenance to emergency exits phase 1-2 El Dorado airport.
Programming schedules of activities and resources, development of databases, digital marketing campaigns, prototype website, generation and conversion of new market niches.

Design prototypes and technical manufacturing tools. We managed to deliver two new products (electric-gas oven, extractor hood). Debugging and updating of databases of parts and drawings of all product lines, along with the modification of the manufacturing and assembly instructions.
